job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a software engineer who loves designing, building, and maintaining software. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies in the security field and contribute to protect IBM's customers from cyber threats at scale.

   As part of your job, you will be part of the integration team, working on existing and new microservices. You will be involved in the design decisions of backend service components, you will develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready. You will be responsible for those components. You will also be involved in writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component. You will work in a collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard., Location StatementIBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer - Python

We are looking for a software engineer who loves designing, building, and maintaining software. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies in the security field and contribute to protect IBM's customers from cyber threats at scale.

   As part of your job, you will be part of the integration team, working on existing and new microservices. You will be involved in the design decisions of backend service components, you will develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready. You will be responsible for those components. You will also be involved in writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component. You will work in a collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard., Location StatementIBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development and microservices within a security context, with no explicit mention of AI, ML, or generative models. While it mentions 'cutting edge technologies', the core responsibilities align with standard software engineering rather than specialized AI roles.

phrases: work on existing and new microservices
design decisions of backend service components
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly describe the creation, implementation, and maintenance of software applications and backend services, which are core to software development.

phrases: writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component
job_tasks.justification: Writing CI/CD pipelines is a key aspect of Operations Engineering, ensuring automated building, testing, and deployment of software components.

phrases: work on cutting edge technologies in the security field
contribute to protect IBM's customers from cyber threats at scale
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the business domain (security, cyber threats) and the strategic goals of protecting customers.
These phrases highlight the importance of teamwork and open communication within the development process.

soft_skills.phrase: work in a collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard
